TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ParametersCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The data to retrieve from the provider.
Docs.summary: References the method to call when retrieving row data from a provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ParametersCallback> delegate represents the method to call for retrieving row data from a provider based on a parameter from the consumer.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ParametersCallback> delegate parameter. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A> method is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> class to retrieve row data for transformation.
